title: Fox's Ingraham to take week off amid controversy
text:
Fox's Ingraham to take week off amid controversy Sunday, April 01, 2018 - 01:07 
Fox News show host Laura Ingraham announced on her show late Friday that she is taking next week off, after almost a dozen advertisers dropped her show after the conservative pundit mocked a teenage survivor of the Florida school massacre on Twitter. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
